title: Removing a working set immediately triggers background refiltering
description: When removing a working set, the package view is immediately refiltered in the background. The package view should only be refiltered when closing the working set selection dialog, not during manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the removal of a working set.
OB: The package view is immediately refiltered in the background when deleting a working set.
EB: The package view should not be refiltered immediately when deleting a working set. Refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel the removal of a working set.
SR:
200204181. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first.
